about_the_game:
Enchanting, mysterious, sprightly and fun, enter the magical, musical world of Fairies with this alluring new pack from ayatosoundcreate. Featuring soothing orchestral-based music perfect for background scenes, mapping, towns, forest / field, in this pack you will find music that blends perfectly with your visuals.

Features:

* Music for towns, villages, strategy, battles, journeys, and more!
* 20 songs in OGG, Looping OGG, M4A and MP3 formats
* Royalty-free music for your RPG Maker Projects

Tracklist:

1 - (Mystery) Temple Piano
2 - (Mystery) Strategy
3 - (Mystery) Womb
4 - (Sad) Monument
5 - (Sad) Fairy Tales
6 - (Sad) Devastated Kingdom
7 - (Tragedy) Forgotten Village
8 - (Tragedy) Tragedy
9 - (Tragedy) Bereavement
10 - (Tragedy) Past
11 - (Pop) 1
12 - (Pop) 2
13 - (Pop) Elder's Story
14 - (Pop) Village
15 - (Battle) Castle Attack
16 - (Battle) Battle
17 - (Field) Searching
18 - (Field) Journey
19 - (Field) Journey 2
20 - (Field) Celtic
